definition: to be situated/to be located (of a building)
surname Zuo
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The fire house is located on Main Street.
sentences.chinese: 消防站坐落在美茵大街。

sentences.english: The Rooks Holiday Hotel, Mae Hong Son is set in the midst of a fascinating valley in Northern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 茹克思假日饭店坐落在泰国北部一处迷人的山谷之中。

sentences.english: The town lie at the end of the valley.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇坐落于河谷的尽头。

sentences.english: A massive sculpture of the seated Buddha rests in the yellowish sandstone cliffs at Single Pebble Village(Danzishizhen) just east of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 大佛坐落于重庆东部弹子石镇附近一处黄砂岩悬崖上。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong's former residence was situated at the South Second Street located on the secluded corner of this county town.
sentences.chinese: 萧红故居，坐落于县城较偏僻的南二道街。

sentences.english: Their arms factory lies in range of high mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他们的武器工厂坐落在群山峻岭之中。

sentences.english: It is located in the beautiful Tongxiang City, Zhejiang Province, on a rich plain praised as "homeland of fish and rice".
sentences.chinese: 地址坐落在环境秀美的“鱼米之乡”浙江省桐乡市。

sentences.english: Located in the admiralty, it's more reminiscent of a hotel than a shopping mall.
sentences.chinese: 其坐落在金钟，它更像一处酒店而非购物中心。

sentences.english: Situated in the southern part of Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, Lushan Mountain is on the bank of Poyang Lake (1).
sentences.chinese: 庐山坐落在潘阳湖岸边，江西省九江市内的南部。

sentences.english: Located on a hill, a long escalator takes me up to what is actually only the ground floor.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔坐落在山上，长长的自动扶梯把我送到宝塔底层。

sentences.english: I have a house which is located on the hillside , which faces the south.
sentences.chinese: 我有一座坐落在山边的面朝南的房子。

sentences.english: Food Machinery Co. , Ltd. Zibo Kwong building located in the famous Huantai.
sentences.chinese: 淄博广安食品机械有限公司坐落在著名建筑之乡桓台。

sentences.english: Yangshuo lies in the northeast of Guangxi Province and to the southeast of Guilin City.
sentences.chinese: 阳朔坐落于广西省东北部，在桂林的东南面。

sentences.english: One is called the City Center Lofts in Salt Lake City, Utah.
sentences.chinese: 一个称为城市阁楼，坐落在犹他州盐湖城。

sentences.english: The company is located in Changle city of Fuzhou, Fujian Province, the renowned "Textile City".
sentences.chinese: 公司坐落在有“纺织之乡”美称的福州长乐市。

sentences.english: Jingshan Park lies right to the north of the Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 景山公园坐落在故宫博物院的正北。

definition: to be situated/located at (of building)/also written 坐落[zuo4 luo4]
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
bordering/adjacent to
to tower/standing tall and upright (of large building)
to be located at/to be situated in
mountains on one side and water on the other
to be right next to/close neighbor
northern extremity
to stand tall/to tower aloft
to take up space/to occupy (space)
building complex
southern end or extremity
foothills
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
southwest part
neighbor/next-door neighbor/near/next to
